CustomField.description: This field is set based on the selections of Risk Ranking, Claims Data, and Safety Engagement together.
CustomField.formula:
IF(Complex_Client__c, 5,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '1 - Low', OR(TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '1 - No Claims',TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '2 - One Claim'), OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None')), 1,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '1 - Low', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '3 - High Loss or Multiple', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None')), 2,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '2 - Moderate', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '1 - No Claims', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None')), 2,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '2 - Moderate', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '2 - One Claim', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program')), 2,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '2 - Moderate', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '2 - One Claim', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None'), 3,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '2 - Moderate', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '3 - High Loss or Multiple', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None')), 3,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '3 - High', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '1 - No Claims', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program'), 2,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '3 - High', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '1 - No Claims', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None')),3,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '3 - High', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '2 - One Claim', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program')), 3,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '3 - High', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '2 - One Claim', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None'), 4,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '3 - High', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '3 - High Loss or Multiple', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '1 - Full Program'), 3,
IF( AND(TEXT(Risk_Ranking__c) = '3 - High', TEXT(Claims_Data__c) = '3 - High Loss or Multiple', OR(TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '2 - Partial Program', TEXT(Safety_Engagement__c) = '3 - None')),4, 0)))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Service Model
